name: smart-writing-companion
description: Assistente editorial local-first para autores de ficção no Obsidian

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json package.json
scripts.release: npm run version && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version" -a || true && git tag -f v$(node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version)") && git push origin --tags

author: Zander Catta Preta
